View.Label: Why create an account?
- Social sharing of your markers\n- Commenting and conversation with the ES community\n- Party / Friend people to track their progress throughout their journeys
Why we ask for an email address:
We will never share your email with anyone. It's used for the following reasons:

- Your gravatar.com image (upload one to gravatar to associate a profile pic with your account)
- Password reset if ever needed
That's it!
